products.title: Olive Green (4567) (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Olive Green (4567) (Blackout) Velux Blackout Roller Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Velux Blackout Roller Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
The Velux blackout blind offers light proof seal for total darkness anytime. It is ideal in bedrooms, where you need complete light control to ensure a good nights sleep or restful nap during the day.

 	Total blackout - best on the market.
 	Oeko-Tex certified.
 	Stepless positioning.
 	Slim design integrates perfectly with your roof window.
 	Available in 24 colours.
 	Installs in minutes.

products.title: Green (1157)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Green (1157) Velux Energy Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Velux Energy Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
The Velux energy blinds offers variable blackout and an insulation effect of up to 19%. The double-pleated blackout cloth has an aluminium honeycomb structure within for significantly improved insulation. Energy blinds are not fixed at the top of the bottom, so you can position them exactly where you need them for light control and privacy.

 	Blackout effect.
 	Flexible and stepless positioning.
 	Improved insulation.
 	Sleek design - no visible cords.
 	Installs in minutes.
 	12 colour choices.

products.title: Lushious Lime (1266)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Lushious Lime (1266) Velux Pleated Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Velux Pleated Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
The Velux pleated blind is an elegant way to provide privacy while bathing your room in a pleasant , soft light. It can be positioned anywhere in the roof window to adjust the amount of incoming light an you can still enjoy a view of he outside.

 	Softly diffuses incoming daylight.
 	Elegant, decorative lighting effect.
 	Flexible and stepless positioning.
 	Slim, elegant side rails and top case.
 	Installs in minutes.
 	20 different colours and designs.

The Velux duo blackout blind is a blackout blind and a pleated blind in one. It offers the best of both worlds, blackout at anytime and softly diffused natural light all day. It is available in all blackout blind colours in combination with a white pleated blind.

 	Blackout at anytime.

 	Slim design integrates perfectly with your roof window.

products.productdescription:
The Velux duo blackout blind is a blackout blind and a pleated blind in one. It offers the best of both worlds, blackout at anytime and softly diffused natural light all day. It is available in all blackout blind colours in combination with a white pleated blind.

 	Blackout at anytime.
 	Oeko-Tex certified.
 	Softly diffuses incoming daylight.
 	Stepless positioning.
 	Slim design integrates perfectly with your roof window.
 	Installs in minutes.

products.productdescription:

products.title: Konya Blackout Vine Green
products.metadescription: Made to Measure Konya Blackout Vine Green Roller Blind | Privacy, Thermal Fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Konya Blackout Vine Green Plain Roller Blind The Konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester, with a PVC blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If both the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion.

The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. products.title: Hive Blackout Green Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure Hive Blackout Green Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX72013. A contemporary blackout blind produced in a honeycomb pleated fabric providing thermal and increasing energy efficiency.
products.productdescription: Hive Blackout Green Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Hive Blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors. The "Hive Blackout" range has a   backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric.  Blackout fabric: Yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.
